*********************************
Propertyshelf MLS Plone Embedding
*********************************

`ps.plone.mls`_ is an add-on for the content management system `Plone`_.
It activates the embedding of real estate listings from the `Propertyshelf`_ MLS.

.. only:: html

  Contents
  ========

.. toctree::

   listing_collections
   listing_search
   development
